resources.string: Delicate skin, thin, obvious pores, sebum secretion less and uniform, no greasy feeling, delicate appearance, sebum secretion quantity is little, white, the lack of luster, small pores, prone to fine wrinkles, capillary table shallow, is sensitive to outside stimuli, pH value of about 5.5 6.0.

Strong sebum secretion, the majority of people with deep color, large pores, oily skin, pH value in the 5.6-6.6, easy to adhesion dirt, causing skin acne, etc.. This type of skin irritation to the outside world, is not easy to produce allergic reactions.

The skin delicate, smooth, elastic, supple and tender, white and red. Its characteristic is the delicate skin structure, oil and water secretion balanced weak skin, delicate pores. And with a shiny, rich elasticity, it is the ideal skin of health.
Mixed skin is a type of skin, it is that in different areas of the face, with different texture characteristics, the most common is T word place appears oily skin, and cheeks is neutral or dry skin.

The skin is thin, easy to see red blood, the temperature is too cold or too hot skin easy to redness, fever. Easily affected by environmental factors, seasonal changes and facial skin care products, and may be accompanied by systemic skin sensitivity.
